text:
@RepMarkGreen @SpeakerPelosi @realDonaldTrump It often helps alleviate a crisis if you EXPOSE and STOP the person who makes the crisis so much worse, who handles the Pandemic so incompetently, callously, and maliciously that he raises the death toll.

#TrumpLiesPeopleDie
#COVID19
#TrumpIsTheWORSTPresidentEVER
